title: Impact Hub Dhaka Limited
mission: To inspire and enable entrepreneurs and organisations to be more impact-driven and sustainable.
tagline: Creating a Bangladesh where everyone thrives
description: Part of the global Impact Hub Network, Impact Hub Dhaka mobilizes a vibrant community of entrepreneurs through inspiring space, meaningful content and diverse networks.

title: YY Studios
description: YY Studios is a creative design studio comprising vibrant and passionate minds who are focussed on amplifying the message of impact driven organizations at home and around the world through expressive and striking designs and much more. Starting from brand identity design and consulting to website design and development and creative campaign management, YY Studios’s take on your brand will splash imagination and inspiration at every sphere.

title: YY Goshti
tagline: Rapid, intense and immersive education for social businesses
description: YY Goshti offers an intense, rapid, and immersive education to accelerate the life cycle of innovative social businesses. The four month long program is designed by social business leaders and investors to help early stage social entrepreneurs with the support required to launch their minimum viable product and raise the needed seed capital.

title: Avijatrik Tourism
mission: To work hand in hand with local people to promote ‘community-based tourism’ to provide travelers with an authentic and meaningful experience and to contribute to the preservation of culture and nature while bringing economic opportunities for sustainable livelihoods to local communities.
tagline: Largest Travel Company & Tourism Marketplace in Bangladesh
description: Avijatrik is an online touring platform to provide adventurous holiday experiences in a different region of Bangladesh. Besides, providing traditional tourism services we provide exclusive community-based tourism services in Bangladesh.

title: Shishir Water
mission: We find, enable and invest in community based water projects started and managed by young entrepreneurs in Bangladesh.
description: Shishir is a clean drinking water solution working to serve the underserved population of Bangladesh at an affordable price so that they can continuously avail it and in an environment friendly way so that there are no negative impacts on nature or the beneficiaries.

title: Amarlab
mission: AmarLab aims to build a world where everyone can easily access quality healthcare at an affordable price.
description: AmarLab is an at-home-at-work pathology test service bridging the gap between patients and diagnostic centers of their choice. Due to road traffic, old age, physical impediment and busy work life, seeking healthcare has become challenging for many. With the aim to make healthcare more accessible, AmarLab works to eliminate the obstacles that keep people from ensuring this basic medical need.

title: Garbageman
description: GARBAGEMAN is the first ict tech-based organization focused on recycling in Bangladesh. Through a scientific approach towards waste management system, GARBAGEMAN aims to create a cleaner and greener Bangladesh by transforming waste into reusable products.

title: Shapla Wellbeing Limited.
mission: To make Menstrual Health Management more accessible for all women across Bangladesh.
tagline: The Leading Menstrual Health Ecosystem in Bangladesh
description: Shapla is Bangladesh’s first and only cashless sanitary vending machine that can dispense sanitary pads using a mobile application. The mobile application can also help raise hygiene and sanitation-based awareness and help with menstrual health management.

title: Dreamwater Limited.
mission: To convert polluted flood water into pure drinking water by using a mechanical portable filter.
tagline: Creating access to safe drinking water
description: Dreamwater Portable Filters Convert polluted water into pure drinking water, providing safe drinking water at an affordable price. These portable filters are useful during flood season in flood-prone areas of Bangladesh.

title: Go Green Bangladesh.
tagline: An anti-polythene social movement dedicated to making Bangladesh green.
description: Go Green Bangladesh develops sustainable alternatives of plastic, to solve the plastic problem. They produce alternatives to plastic straws, poly bags, plastic bottles, etc. They also turn clothes and single-use plastics into bricks named CPB (Cloth Plastic Brick).

title: TransEnd
mission: To help 1 million marginalized and underrepresented hijra, non-binary, gender queer, transgender and intersex community in Bangladesh being skilled in order to pursuing social and economic empowerment.
description: TransEnd is a youth-led organisation empowering the transgender community in Bangladesh through education, training, entrepreneurship and employment.

title: Best Aid Limited
description: Best Aid is a telehealth company, based on a one-stop digital healthcare, a concept which provides 24/7 online consultancy using both audio and video platform with specialist doctors as the patient requires.

title: Tetra
mission: To improve the lives of rural people who are affected by salinity in the coastal areas of Bangladesh
tagline: Safe drinking water for low-income and marginalised communities
description: Tetra is working to improve the lives of rural people who are affected by salinity in the coastal areas of Bangladesh. To combat the issue of salinity, they aim to install innovative water purifiers which can simultaneously desalinate and purify water by using sunlight.

title: Wreetu Health & Well-being
mission: To ensure that all girls receive menstrual hygiene education before they get their first period.
description: Wreetu offers comprehensive menstrual education to the community through interactive sessions and comic books, manufactures sustainable menstrual hygiene products and provides MHM consultancy to organizations and individuals.
